name: E-Commerce Platform
description: A full-featured e-commerce platform with real-time inventory management, payment processing, and admin dashboard. Built with modern technologies for scalability and performance.

name: Task Management System
description: Collaborative task management application with real-time updates, team collaboration features, and advanced filtering. Optimized for teams of all sizes.

name: Analytics Dashboard
description: Professional analytics dashboard with beautiful data visualizations, real-time metrics, and customizable reports. Built for data-driven decision making.

name: Social Media API
description: RESTful API for a social media platform with authentication, post management, real-time notifications, and comprehensive documentation.

name: Portfolio Generator
description: AI-powered portfolio generator that creates beautiful, customizable portfolios in minutes. Features drag-and-drop builder and real-time preview.

name: Mobile Banking App
description: Secure mobile banking application with biometric authentication, transaction history, and real-time notifications. Built with security-first approach.
